name: Telekinetic Maneuver
description: With a rush of telekinetic power, you move a foe or something they carry. While you have this spell prepared, you can attempt to <action>Disarm</action>, <action>Shove</action>, or <action>Trip</action> an adjacent target using a spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check. /nYou may expend this spell to target a creature within the full range of the spell.
